text_block_list.text: ‚ÄúJapan Derby‚Äù
The most historic, traditional and honorable race in the world. Can only be run once in a lifetime. How cruel it is.
In fact, Many Horse Girls have lost before reaching that dream. The dream of all Horse Girls. It is to be standing at the top as the Derby Horse Girl.
On that day, as many as 20 million people watched, as the gates opened.
It's hard to participate in the derby and win. However, the one in the peach pink clothes in the competition, charging her way.
Sprinting her way through, not letting anyone away. It was a tough battle of attrition.
Running through the goal beating the approaching rivals. In the body that has put out it's everything, only 1 ounce of energy was also left.
That was just 1 of her victories.
The name of the winner was Ines Fujin.
On that day, the different echoed cheers for Ines Fujin in the turf still resonate in the minds of all the fans.
(Cheers!!!!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now, the last line! Which Horse Girl will be the victorious!

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Horse Girl sister do your best!

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Amazing, Amazing! Sister and everyone are fast!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Going up they are fast! Between the two strong forces who will be taking the lead!

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: No, My sister will be overtaken!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She is doing it! Only 1 length from behind! The difference will widen!

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Poor sister.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket‚Äôs Mother
text_block_list.text: Your sister hasn't given up yet, has she? So Ticket don't give up and keep cheering her on.

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: mmm‚Ä¶ Good luck!! Good luck!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now crossing the„Éº„Éº„Éº goal! Beating her own rivals and becoming the crown Horse Girl!

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: My sister lost. She is crying

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket‚Äôs Mother
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was a shame, she worked hard. But you see, The older sister who won is crying too.

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: You're right, Why?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket‚Äôs Mother
text_block_list.text: Derby is the dream of every Horse girl sister.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket‚Äôs Mother
text_block_list.text: The reason they cry even if they win or lose is because they worked hard towards their dreams. It's because they tried a lot.

text_block_list.name: Young Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Dream‚Ä¶. Derby‚Ä¶.
The days of sweltering hot days are gradually becoming less and less.
At Tracen Academy, the annual school event the ‚ÄúHoly Hoof Festival‚Äù was approaching.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yosh! Cabbage suppliers secured!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Cabbage? What are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ‚ÄùHoly Hoof Festival‚Äù ‚ÄúHoly Hoof Festival‚Äù. That's when I decided to sell Gold-chan Yakisoba.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: McQueen and Trainer-san will have to help me on that day, so you better get used to handling the iron plate from now on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I only have a bad feeling about this. Trainer-san, I'll leave the poison taste of the Yakisoba to you.
choice_data_list: It's not a normal taste test, but a poisonous one‚Ä¶.?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Don't worry, I'm not going to put something inedible. ‚ÄúCabbage and Carrots, kneaded Wasabi, Hon Wasabi and Kizami Wasabi‚Äù.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How much Wasabi are you planning to put in!?
Like this, everyone in the school was preparing for the Holy Hoof Festival. In the middle of that „Éº

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, so you were here.
Tatsuna-san, the secretary of the Board of Directors of Tracen Academy, came to visit in a good mood.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Big NewsùÖ† Actually, it was decided that the previous trainer is to be honored by URA.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Honored? Did he find a stray cat?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Don't you know? It is the prize given to Horse Girls and Trainers who have made brilliant achievements.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There are people who aim for it, and when you get the honor, photos and achievements get the right to be displayed at the ‚ÄúUma Musume Museum‚Äù in the Tokyo Race Field.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: He is a person worthy of being honored. In particular, Oguri san's last run has received great support even now.
That day it was not only the fans who supported it. Me and Mejiro McQueen were there too. That Arima Kinen was an unforgettable race.
That day it was not only the fans who supported it. Me and Mejiro McQueen were there too. That Arima Kinen was an unforgettable race.
As expected, She was called the Horse girl on snow, it was really amazing, after all Sensei.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: The award ceremony will be broadcasted live, so please watch it!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Apart from that, I have 1 request for you Trainer-san‚Ä¶.
I want you to help me with this Horse Girl who is being chased in preparation for the Holy Hoof Festival. It was when I visited the library when I was told about her.
WaaaaaÔΩûÔΩû!! I'm impressedÔΩûÔΩû!!
No matter how many times she lost, no matter how many times she got hurt, she kept running quitely. This girl has done a lot of hard work.
A cry echoing in the library room that should be quiet. There is no one else, and she is the one who wants my help with the Holy Hoof Festival?
choice_data_list: Do you want me to help you with the Holy Hoof Festival?
Do you want me to help you with the Holy Hoof Festival?

text_block_list.text: Ah! Are you by any chance the Trainer that Tatsuna was talking about? AhhhÔΩûÔΩû You are going to help meÔΩûÔΩû Thank YouÔΩûÔΩûÔΩûÔΩû!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Not now‚Ä¶ I didn't say hello! Nice to meet you. I'm Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: WellÔΩû, Even though I ran for the position of the Holy Hoof Festival, But when I got ready, I realized I didn't have a helping hand at allÔΩû.
choice_data_list: So, what can I help you with?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: In Summary! ‚ÄúDerby Exhibition‚Äù The materials to be exhibited are!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: From the 1st! The excitement and passion of the Seniors who challenged the derby! To show them all!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: For example, This Horse Girl, from the outer outside ran at once up to the 1st place! Conveying her feelings through the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Then here, Getting 1st place by running away from the start! Even though it's hard to win that way, she still believed in her own run‚Ä¶. Sob‚Ä¶
Speaking of the derby, in the Twinkle Series it is considered to be the highest peak race.
‚ÄùThe year begins with Derby and ends with Derby‚Äù There is no doubt that it is a big existence to some people.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: After all, the Derby is the bestÔΩû!! OohÔΩûÔΩûÔΩû! Aim for the Derby Horse Girl !!!
Her eyes were wet with tears as she spoke of the Derby. She seems to like the Derby a lot.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, sorry for making you stay up so late! When it comes to the Derby, I get really fired up.
It was interesting. For Winning Ticket, the Derby is special.
It was interesting. For Winning Ticket, the Derby is special.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yes! Winning the Derby is my dream!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Go out to the Derby and win! The dream is to create a drama that does not lose to the seniors.
This side of Winning Ticket, who said so, was so dignified that I could not imagine it from the time she was moved to tears and cried.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Well, the first thing I need to do is get scouted to do that. To a Trainer who will let me take on the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, but what I have to do now is the derby exhibition! Let's make it a success with both of us!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: And I'm fine with Tickezou. That's easier to call, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe, Nice to meet you! Trainer-san!
I don't know if she can go to the Derby or if she can win if she goes out there„Éº
However, I wanted to see her drama chasing dreams that shines so purely.
